             int cols)

Method Detail

calculateSlopes

public void calculateSlopes()
Calculates the slopes of the point stored in candidatePosition from scan method. If the velocity is equal to zero, that means it is calculating the monster point, and automatically sets the velocity of that point to the inputted monster velocity. Values are stored into 4 different arrays that hold x and y coordinates, and x and y velocities. The indexes will match for each array will match for a specific point.

detectFuturePoint

public void detectFuturePoint(int scanNum)
Detects future points in the grid to compare against points found to be true in the first iteration via scan. If a point is invalid in any way, the x and y coordinate are set to 0, and the x and y velocities set to -20.

findMonsterVelocity

public int findMonsterVelocity()
Finds the x and y velocity of the monster. This is the main algorithm.

getDiscoveredDx

public int getDiscoveredDx()
Returns the monster's x velocity found via the algorithm.

getDiscoveredDy

public int getDiscoveredDy()
Returns the monster's y velocity found via the algorithm.

injectNoise

public void injectNoise()
Sets cells as falsely triggering detection based on the specified probability

isDetected

public boolean isDetected(int row,
                          int col)
Returns true if the specified location in the radar grid triggered a detection.

Parameters:
row - the row of the location to query for detection
col - the column of the location to query for detection
Returns:
true if the specified location in the radar grid triggered a detection

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

monsterMove

public void monsterMove()
Updates the position of the monster. If the monster attempts to go past the size of Radar, it will set the monster coordinates to (99,99) After updating the position of the monster, it will set that point in currentScan to true.

scan

public void scan()
Performs a scan of the radar. Creates an array of possible monster locations which are then stored into a list if they are detected to be true.

setDiscoveredDx

public void setDiscoveredDx(int x)
Stores the monster's x velocity found via the algorithm.

setNoiseFraction

public void setNoiseFraction(double fraction)
Sets the probability that a given cell will generate a false detection

Parameters:
fraction - the probability that a given cell will generate a flase detection expressed as a fraction (must be >= 0 and < 1)
